Sentencas: However, implementing systems is more difficult because of sealing challenges, slow start-up and complex thermal management and fuel processing.

Sentencas: A novel furnace system with a flame-assisted fuel cell is proposed that combines the thermal management and fuel processing systems by utilizing fuel-rich combustion.

Sentencas: In addition, the flame-assisted fuel cell furnace is a micro-combined heat and power system, which can produce electricity for homes or businesses, providing resilience during power disruption while still providing heat.
